dcterms:creator: M. Shridhar
X. Yuan
M.-A. Côté
Y. Bisk

M. J. Hausknecht
dcterms:description: AlfWorld is a household task environment where models explore rooms and use commonsense reasoning to perform tasks, such as putting a pencil on the desk.
dcterms:title: AlfWorld (ALF)

dcterms:creator: Y. Gu
X. Deng
Y. Su
dcterms:description: ScienceWorld is a complex interactive text environment that challenges agents' scientific commonsense, requiring navigation through distinct functional rooms and tool utilization to complete tasks.
dcterms:title: ScienceWorld (SW)

dcterms:creator: M. Chevalier-Boisvert
D. Bahdanau
S. Lahlou
L. Willems
C. Saharia
T. H. Nguyen
Y. Bengio
dcterms:description: BabyAI is an interactive environment where agents navigate and manipulate objects in a grid space, designed to study sample efficiency in grounded language learning.
dcterms:title: BabyAI (BA)

dcterms:creator: M. J. Hausknecht
P. Ammanabrolu
M.-A. Côté
X. Yuan
dcterms:description: Jericho is a collection of text-based game environments that evaluate agents in fictional worlds, requiring exploration and interaction to complete adventures.
dcterms:title: Jericho (JC)

dcterms:creator: M. Vallati
L. Chrpa
M. Grześ
T. L. McCluskey
M. Roberts
S. Sanner
dcterms:description: PDDL is a set of strategic games defined with PDDL symbolic language, requiring agents to perform complex planning tasks across various domains.
dcterms:title: PDDL (PL)

dcterms:creator: S. Yao
H. Chen
J. Yang
K. Narasimhan
dcterms:description: WebShop is a network-based simulation environment for e-commerce experiences, allowing agents to interact with a website to purchase products.
dcterms:title: WebShop (WS)

dcterms:creator: S. Zhou
F. F. Xu
H. Zhu
X. Zhou
R. Lo
A. Sridhar
dcterms:description: WebArena is a realistic web environment that supports various web browsing actions, allowing agents to perform tasks across multiple applications.
dcterms:title: WebArena (WA)

dcterms:creator: Y. Qin
S. Hu
Y. Lin
W. Chen
N. Ding
G. Cui
dcterms:description: Tool-Query consists of environments where agents query information using various tools, focusing on information retrieval tasks.
dcterms:title: Tool-Query (TQ)

dcterms:creator: Y. Liang
C. Wu
T. Song
W. Wu
Y. Xia
dcterms:description: Tool-Operation environments allow agents to access and manipulate information about personal agendas and spreadsheets.
dcterms:title: Tool-Operation (TO)
